author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38250 to **CMSSW_12_4_0**.

A full set of xml files for the L1 emulation of prescales and masks coherent with the updated L1 menu for Run 3 has been created and pushed to [L1Trigger-L1TGlobal](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal) ([PR#11](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal/pull/11)). A backport of these files has been requested in the github issue https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal/issues/12. Changes will be backported to **CMSSW_12_4_0** in **cms-sw/cmsdist** after the tests: [PR#7926](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7926) for 12_4_X cms-dist ready.

#### PR validation:
Basic tests performed successfully starting from CMSSW_12_4_X_2022-06-10-2300.
> cmsrel CMSSW_12_4_X_2022-06-10-2300 
> cd CMSSW_12_4_X_2022-06-10-2300/src
> cmsenv
> git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/Configuration
> git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/L1TGlobal
> cd L1Trigger/L1TGlobal
> mkdir -p data/Luminosity/startup
> wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/master/development/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_1_0/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_1_0.xml 
> cd -
> git cherry-pick df9c038b41c74105effa5a7df3d8ecb02473b1f5
> scram b distclean 
> git cms-checkdeps -a -A
> scram b -j 8
> scram b runtests 
> scram build code-checks
> scram build code-format
title: [Backport] Updates related to the L1 menu v1_1_0 for the start of Run 3
